#include <iostream>
#include<list>
#include<queue>
using namespace std;
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int n,m,x,y,l;
	cin>>n>>m;
	
	bool vis[10001]={0};
	list<int> que[n+1];
	
	for(int i=0;i<m;++i){	
		cin>>x>>y;
		que[x].push_back(y);
		que[y].push_back(x);
	}
	
	int flag=1;
	queue<int> q;
	q.push(1);
	while(!q.empty()){
		l=q.front();
		if(vis[l]!=0) {
			q.pop();	
			continue;
		}vis[l]=1;
		
		//cout<<l<<": ";
		while(! que[l].empty()){
			q.push(que[l].front());
			//cout<<que[l].front()<<" ";
			que[l].pop_front();
		}
		////cout<<"\n";
		q.pop();
	}
	
	for(int i=1;i<=n;++i) if(vis[i]==0) {cout<<"NO\n";flag=0;break;}
	
	if(flag!=0) {if(m==n-1) cout<<"YES\n";else cout<<"NO\n";}
	return 0;
}
